trans-unit.source: The data to retrieve from the provider.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem recuperados do provedor.

trans-unit.source: References the method to call when retrieving row data from a provider.
trans-unit.target: Faz referência ao método a ser chamado ao recuperar dados de linha de um provedor.

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface and serves as a provider in a Web Parts connection, the connection or transformer must retrieve the row data from the provider.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle de Web Parts implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface e funciona como um provedor em uma conexão de Web Parts, a conexão ou transformador necessário recuperar os dados da linha do provedor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback> delegate represents the method to call for retrieving the provider data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback> delegate representa o método a ser chamado para recuperar os dados do provedor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A> method contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback> delegate parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A> método contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback> delegar o parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A> method is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> class to retrieve row data for transformation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A> método é usado o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> classe e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> classe para recuperar dados de linha para a transformação.
